name: pnp-devproxy-microsoft-graph-rate-limiting
title: Simulate rate limiting on Microsoft Graph APIs
shortDescription: This sample contains a preset to simulate rate limiting on Microsoft Graph APIs. Selected Microsoft Graph endpoints support rate limiting, which is a mechanism that informs developers of the available server resources and allows them to increase the data throughput by staying under the rate limits and avoiding throttling.
longDescription: This sample contains a preset to simulate rate limiting on Microsoft Graph APIs. Selected Microsoft Graph endpoints support rate limiting, which is a mechanism that informs developers of the available server resources and allows them to increase the data throughput by staying under the rate limits and avoiding throttling.
